name: Good Knockoff Dinorun
description:
Welcome to Knockoff Dinorun 2! I wanted to make a game over spring break and decided I ought to revisit Knockoff Dinorun. The original was terrible in every sense of the world and the fact it exists is deeply upsetting, so to make up for it I created this! 

It's better in every way (in my opinion), the gameplay is smoother, the cacti are actually random, the pacing doesn't randomly go from 1 to 1000 when the score hits 600. Best of all you can play it in browser, something the original lacked (not sure why but it did!) 

Overall this was loads of fun to do and to learn, and most of the features added are visual and quality of life. Sadly I didn't have the drive nor mind to try and make it so there is a gradual increase in cacti speed and I hope you can forgive me, alongside that I didn't have the will to add in pterodactyls (first try!) and I hope you can forgive me for these actions curtesy of the many cacti in the game.

Overall I hope you enjoy it, cheers!
